data.expected_result: Empty space does not get highlighted
data.short_description: Mentions in in-app notifications that split across a line break highlights the extra space
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have either a username or nickname that contains 3-4 words - Make sure that you are able to receive in-app notifications - Have someone ping you, and make sure that the mention is broken across a line break in the notification - Observe the spacing after the last word in your name before the line break
